front.title: Transparent Third Party Call Control Model for SIP-H.323 Interworking

abstract.t: This contribution describes a generalized interworking mechanism between SIP and H.323 for third party call control where the controller function can reside anywhere within the IP Telephony network. The proposed generalized interworking mechanism offers transparent IP Telephony services between the SIP and H.323 endpoints considering the third party call control function resides in a separate application server. The implementation of the third party call control function on a SIP proxy, SIP endpoint, H.323 GK, H.323 endpoint, MCU, or IWF is a special case of the generalized mechanism proposed in this document
